content:
Kubectl commands
kubectl get pods -A -o wide kubectl run -it new-image --image=alpine kubectl get all -A kubectl top (also top pod and node) kubectl explain pod.spec --recursive kubectl api-versions kubectl auth can-i exec pods --kubeconfig=config kubectl describe pv kubectl describe pv kubectl get storageclass kubectl get apiservice https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/policy/pod-security-policy/ https://pkg.go.dev/sigs.k8s.io/cluster-api#section-readme
title: General

content:
Git git remote set-url --push upstream no_push git config --global credential.helper osxkeychain git whatchanged -p --since="1 week ago" OpenSSL openssl req x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout key.pem -out cert.pem -days 365 -nodes openssl genrsa -des3 -out rootCA.key 4096 Check cert belongs to private key
openssl x509 -noout -modulus -in CERTIFICATE.crt | openssl md5 openssl req -noout -modulus -in CSR.csr | openssl md5 openssl rsa -noout -modulus -in PRIVATEKEY.key | openssl md5 sed https://www.gnu.org/software/sed/manual/html_node/Multiline-techniques.html Misc checkip.amazonaws.com aws-shell https://github.com/awslabs/aws-shell stress-ng https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Kernel/Reference/stress-ng lsd https://github.com/Peltoche/lsd
title: General

content: aws ec2 describe-instances --region=eu-west-2 --filters="Name=instance-state-name,Values=running" aws s3api --region=eu-west-1 put-bucket-encrytion --bucket bucket-name --server-side-encryption-configuration '{"Rules": [ { "ApplyServerSideEncryptionByDefault": { "SSEAlgorithm": "AES256" } } ] }' aws s3api put-public-access-block \  --bucket my-bucket \  --public-access-block-configuration "BlockPublicAcls=true,IgnorePublicAcls=true,BlockPublicPolicy=true,RestrictPublicBuckets=true" aws s3api --region eu-west-1 put-bucket-tagging Tagset='[{Key=owner,Value='blah'}]'  IAM live: https://github.com/iann0036/iamlive Scout Suite: https://github.com/nccgroup/ScoutSuite
title: Random Commands
